com.university.utils.commands.ICommand

Packages that use ICommand
Package
Description
com.university.utils.commands

  • Uses of ICommand in com.university.utils.commands

    Classes in com.university.utils.commands that implement ICommand
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DropCommand
    The DropCommandclass implements the ICommand interface to drop an item from the player's inventory into the current room.
    class 
    EscapeCommand
    The EscapeCommand class implements the ICommand interface to escape from a trap in the current room.
    class 
    HelpCommand
    The HelpCommand class implements the ICommand interface This command outputs a list of available commands, along with their descriptions and aliases, to guide the player on how to interact with the game.
    class 
    LookAroundCommand
    The LookAroundCommand class implements the ICommand interface and allows the player to "look around" in the current room.
    class 
    MoveCommand
    The MoveCommand class implements the ICommand interface and is responsible for moving the player in a specified direction This command is triggered when the player decides to move to a different room
    class 
    OpenChestCommand
     
    class 
    PickUpCommand
    The PickUpCommand class implements the ICommand interface and handles the action of picking up an item from the current room.
    class 
    QuitCommand
    The QuitCommand class handles the action of quitting the game When executed, it stops the game loop and displays a quit message to the player
    class 
    ShowInventoryCommand
    The ShowInventoryCommand class implements the ICommand interface and is responsible for displaying the player's current inventory.
    class 
    ShowMapCommand
    The ShowMapCommand class implements the ICommand interface and is responsible for displaying the map of the dungeon.
    class 
    ShowStatsCommand
    The ShowStatsCommand class implements the ICommand interface and is responsible for displaying the player's current statistics, such as power points and current room, in a nicely formatted output.
    class 
    UnknownCommand
     
    class 
    UseCommand
    The UseCommand class implements the ICommand interface and handles the use of an item from the player's inventory The command will search for an item by name, and if found, it will apply its effect If the item is consumable, it will be removed from the inventory after use
    class 
    WakeUpCommand
    The WakeUpCommand class implements the action of waking up the player If the player is asleep, it attempts to use an "alarm clock" item from the player's inventory If no alarm clock is available, the player wakes up by lossing power points
    Methods in com.university.utils.commands that return ICommand
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ICommand
    CommandFactory.createCommand(Command command, CommandContext commandContext)
    Creates a command based on the name and context.
    Method parameters in com.university.utils.commands with type arguments of type ICommand
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    CommandFactory.registerCommand(Command command, Function<CommandContext,ICommand> creator)
    Registers a command with its associated creator function.

  • Uses of ICommand in com.university.utils.parsers

    Methods in com.university.utils.parsers that return ICommand
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ICommand
    CommandParser.parse(String userInput)
    Parses the user's input and returns the corresponding ICommand based on the command and additional context such as direction or item name.
